name: Yocan Black Phaser Max 2 Vaporizer
description:
The Yocan Black Phaser Max 2 is a high-performance vaporizer designed for concentrate lovers. With precise temperature control, a powerful battery, and smooth vapor delivery via ceramic heating and water filtration, it combines innovation with comfort. Ideal for users seeking portability without sacrificing power.
Key Features:
SKU: YCNBLK-PHSR-MAX-2-BK
Battery: 2100 mAh with USB‑C fast charging (~2.5 hrs)
Temperature Range: 440 °F – 660 °F (adjustable)
Coil: Cloud2 360° ceramic heating + TGT coil included
Display: OLED screen with real-time session info
Design: Ergonomic pistol grip for comfort and control
Filtration: Built-in water bubbler for smooth hits
Colors Available: Black, Blue, Red, Silver
Includes: Extra coil, dab tool, cleaning brush, USB‑C cable, user manual

name: Blizzard Raspberry –4.5L Flavored Whipped Cream N₂O Tanks by Doodlez
description: Doodlez’s Blizzard Raspberry Flavored Whipped Cream N₂O Tanks deliver premium food-grade nitrous oxide infused with sweet raspberry flavor, ideal for whipped cream dispensers, culinary infusions, or mixology. These tanks come in multiple sizes (1 L, 2.2 L, 4.5 L), offering flexible options for different usage needs. The 1 L size is affordably priced at $44.99 but is backordered; larger sizes are priced accordingly. The 4.5 L variant is currently sold out.

name: Pink Strawberry –4.5L N₂O Tanks by Doodlez
shortDescription: Experience rich strawberry flavor with the Doodlez Pink Strawberry 4.5L (3060g) N₂O Tank. A high-capacity, food-grade nitrous oxide tank perfect for whipping, infusions, and Nitro brews — ideal for kitchens, cafés, and caterers.
detailedDescription:
The Doodlez Pink Strawberry 4.5L (3060g) N₂O Tank delivers flavorful performance and serious volume. Infused with a bold strawberry aroma, this refillable tank is perfect for whipped creams, mousses, Nitro coffee, and mixology creations.

- Large 3060g Capacity – Fewer refills, more productivity
- Strawberry-Flavored N₂O – Adds flavor right from the source
- Food-Grade & Ultra-Pure – Safe and clean for all culinary use
- Compatible Design – Works with standard dispensers and regulators
- Reusable & Eco-Friendly – A sustainable option for heavy users

Upgrade your culinary game with Doodlez – where flavor meets performance.

name: Casper THCA Jelly Rolls – Watermelon Zkittlez (2 Pre-Rolls × 2 g)
description: Elevate your experience with Casper THCA Jelly Rolls—each roll packed with 2 g of hand‑rolled USA-grown, THCA-rich flower infused with jelly badder for that next-level flavor and potency. These fat, terpene-heavy joints deliver smooth, powerful hits with a sweet watermelon candy aroma in every puff. Designed for those who want bold flavor and serious effects.
